title: GetGroupMember (Method)
text:
METHOD GetGroupMember : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets a group member (given by a BACnet-Object-Reference) and its name at index nIndex from the Group_Members-Property and
the Group_Member_Names-Property of this BACnet-Object. Both the group member and its name are aquired simulatenously by
this function.

rows.Name: nIndex
rows.Comment: The 1 based index of the group member to get.

rows.Name: groupMember
rows.Comment: The gotten group member after the method call.

rows: The name of the gotten group member after the method call.
